_Startup: Settings that will only be used at startup.

Startup._EnableSwagger: Enable or disable the Swagger UI.

ConnectionStrings._MongoConnection: The connection string to the MongoDB database.

Netflow9._Enabled: Enable or disable the Netflow9 collector.
Netflow9._ListeningPort: The port to listen on for Netflow9 packets.

Ipfix._Enabled: Enable or disable the Ipfix collector.
Ipfix._ListeningPort: The port to listen on for Ipfix packets.

Security._Access: Configuration for users and how accessing endpoints should behave.

Access._Username: The username of the default user. Only generated if no users exist in the database.
Access._Password: The password of the default user.

Jwt._Key: The secret used to sign the JWT tokens. If not set, a random key will be generated.

Elasticsearch._Uri: The URI of the Elasticsearch cluster. All certificates are accepted, be careful!
Elasticsearch._Username: The username to use when authenticating with Elasticsearch. Leave empty if no authentication is required.
Elasticsearch._Password: The password to use when authenticating with Elasticsearch. Leave empty if no authentication is required.
